CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing

By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft Purview Endpoint DLP blanket protections for unscannable file types
CurrentVersion.description:
Purview Endpoint DLP supports a set of specific file extensions and types. For file extensions not listed in this document, customers must use the 'File extension is' or 'File type is' rule condition. However, this approach can be challenging, as it requires manually enumerate all desired file extensions. This feature will enable protection for files outside the standard Purview Endpoint DLP monitoring scope.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/endpoint-dlp-learn-about#monitored-files

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft Purview Endpoint DLP blanket protections for unscannable file types
CurrentVersion.description:
Purview Endpoint DLP supports a set of specific file extensions and types. For file extensions not listed in this document, customers must use the 'File extension is' or 'File type is' rule condition. However, this approach can be challenging, as it requires manually enumerate all desired file extensions. This feature will enable protection for files outside the standard Purview Endpoint DLP monitoring scope.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/dlp-create-deploy-policy?tabs=purview#scenario-3-apply-controls-to-supported-files-that-fail-scanning

CurrentVersion.description: In the Web tab in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, users can access Microsoft One Drive or Microsoft SharePoint to find and insert cloud files in their prompts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Insert cloud files from One Drive in Copilot Chat
OldVersion.description: Insert cloud files from One Drive in Copilot Chat web grounding conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Report a Message for External Collaboration
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users can now report security risks and concerns in external one-on-one, group and meeting chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Report a Message for External Collaboration
OldVersion.description: Teams users can now report security risks and concerns in external one-on-one, group and meeting chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings responses can be exported to Word and Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Now, certain responses from Copilot in Teams meetings will have an option to ‘edit in’ Word or Excel. The ‘edit in’ option for Word will be available for Copilot responses that are long (more than 1300 characters) and will automatically open a Word document with the response written. The ‘edit in’ option for Excel will be available for Copilot responses that are formatted in a table, and will automatically open an Excel file with the formatted response added. Copilot responses can only be exported if the meeting policy for the meeting is set to allow copying or forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, transcript, and Copilot responses. The export capability will also inherit the sensitivity label of the meeting (sensitivity labels are available to Teams Premium users).

Copilot responses can only be exported if the meeting policy for the meeting is set to allow copying or forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, transcript, and Copilot responses. The export capability will also inherit the sensitivity label of the meeting (sensitivity labels are available to Teams Premium users).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room recommender
CurrentVersion.description: If no room is booked for a meeting, this AI feature recommends rooms in the meeting chat an hour before start when two or more attendees are in the same building, making in-person collaboration easier. It considers location of participants, room availability, and capacity to find the best meeting space. You can reserve the suggested room with one click and update the invite for everyone. A Teams Premium license is required for the meeting organizer to enable this feature, which is available in Teams Mobile on iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
OldVersion.description: Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support on users trying to paste sensitive content into web browsers on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will now support 2-click view for encrypted emails. This feature enables admins to require user confirmation before allowing access to encrypted emails. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Team's team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team from the Copilot Prompt Gallery in Copilot Chat, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pop-out live captions and Real-time-Text (RTT) in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize live captions (including live translated captions), and real-time-text (RTT) from the main meeting window. This enables you to position the captions and RTT wherever you prefer on your screen, so you can easily focus on the meeting while viewing the incoming text in a position most comfortable for you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : MDM-independent support for Endpoint DLP on MacOS devices
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint DLP is extending support to MacOS devices independent of the MDM solution used to deploy (previously supported through JAMF or Intune).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slide control for presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting or event presenters can now share control of slides with fellow presenters eliminating manual slide changes and maintaining a smooth flow during meetings or webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Pages in Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: This brings the editable Copilot Pages feature which is already shipped WW to the government environment. The pages feature enables users to add their M365 Copilot responses to a page where they can edit and share with others for collaboration. This happens right within the M365 Copilot app.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Sizing Feature
CurrentVersion.description: The Text Sizing feature offers users the ability to: 1. Adjust Font Sizes: Increase or decrease font sizes as needed. 2. Preset Font Sizes: Choose from preset font sizes for convenience. 3. Custom Text Size: Input custom text sizes for enhanced clarity. This feature enhances readability, improves clarity, and establishes a structured visual hierarchy, ensuring well-organized and easily comprehensible content on the board.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard Trendline Additions
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Dashboard users can now visualize trends in additional key adoption and impact metrics over time to more quickly identify patterns and opportunities in employee adoption for better licensing decisions. Users will be able to now view Adoption metrics on either a monthly or weekly timeframe for specific groups of interest, as well as deep dive into Impact metrics like Copilot Assisted Hours, Actions Taken, and feature-specific dimensions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Large Audience Warnings in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users are warned when they are emailing a large number of recipients which can help them make the correct decision about wording, tone, and content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Intune policies in the Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins now can set Intune policies via the Edge management service, alongside the existing cloud policies. This enables admins to deploy both browser policies in the cloud and Intune policies from a single pane, making it easy to keep users safe and the browser workflow streamlined. This feature comes along with a new policy creation wizard that will streamline the creation process into a comprehensive, step-by-step flow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
OldVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Answer insights and enhanced user adoption analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Answer analytics for Microsoft Search provides insights into how editorial content like Bookmarks, Acronyms and Q&A are performing within the organization. Enhanced user analytics provides insights into search adoption across search applications like SharePoint, Microsoft Search for Bing, Microsoft Search for Windows, Microsoft365.com, and now also cover in-app searches from Outlook, Teams and other office applications. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
CurrentVersion.description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Email Auto-advance setting
CurrentVersion.description: The Email Auto-advance option is available in Mail settings. This will allow users to choose whether they return to the message list after taking certain actions or if they move to the next message.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop guest sharing via Entra B2B configuration for organizations with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Enable B2B guest sharing for Loop workspaces, pages, and components, subject to administrator policy. This allows sharing with people outside your tenant and now includes organizations that utilize sensitivity labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Mail Merge (Advanced) on Outlook on the Web and new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Mail Merge (Basic) will be improved upon to allow fields to be replaced by values per email address. When Mail Merge (Advanced) is launched, not only will every recipient receive their own email with only their email address in the recipients list, but the emails can further be personalized to include content such as their name. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft Purview Endpoint DLP blanket protections for unscannable file types
CurrentVersion.description:
Purview Endpoint DLP supports a set of specific file extensions and types. For file extensions not listed in this document, customers must use the 'File extension is' or 'File type is' rule condition. However, this approach can be challenging, as it requires manually enumerate all desired file extensions. This feature will enable protection for files outside the standard Purview Endpoint DLP monitoring scope.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/endpoint-dlp-learn-about#monitored-files

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Increased number of tasks and dependencies per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Create and manage up to 3,000 tasks and 2,000 dependencies within a Microsoft Planner premium plan.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom Meeting Branding - Support multiple meeting themes per customization policy
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now create and assign multiple meeting themes to a customization policy in the Teams Admin Center. This will allow meeting organizers who are assigned to a customization policy the ability to select from different meeting theme options while scheduling their meetings. Note - this feature requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Edge contextual capabilities in Business Chat work mode
CurrentVersion.description: In Business Chat work mode, users can ask Copilot questions about web pages and PDFs opened in the Edge browser using page context, such as “summarize this page". This feature is currently also available in Business Chat web mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Automated device enrollment without user affinity for visionOS and tvOS
CurrentVersion.description: Support for visionOS and tvOS through automated device enrollment for userless enrollment with Microsoft Intune Suite including Intune Plan 2

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: New enrollment policies experience for iOS/iPadOS ADE
CurrentVersion.description: These enrollment policies for iOS/iPadOS contains enrollment time grouping, improved UI, and removes automatic deployment of the Company Portal app and deprecated settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Auto detection of room audio in BYOD rooms expanded to audio devices with video
CurrentVersion.description: The room audio auto-detect and pre-select feature for BYOD rooms that was released in October 2024 now activates the video component of composite audio-video peripherals as the selected camera in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Queues App – adding Service level for Realtime stats

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Enhanced admin notification settings experience
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a modernized user experience for admin notification settings within Viva Engage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can enable transcription in multilingual meetings (Copilot and Teams Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing a new organizer-level control that no longer requires all meetings to have one common spoken language to be set across all participants. Meeting organizers with Copilot or Teams Premium licenses will see a new control in meeting options called “Enable multilingual speech recognition.” When this is enabled before a meeting, each meeting participant will be able to set their own spoken language during the meeting, and the meeting transcript can accurately reflect each participant’s language of choice.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat – Loop Workspaces in ContextIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use ContextIQ to scope to your Loop Workspaces content in the Files tab.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Apple and Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Apple and Android devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for Web
CurrentVersion.description: Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for the Web in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.

CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator agent notetaking in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The Facilitator agent takes real-time notes during your Teams meetings, allowing everyone to co-author and collaborate seamlessly. This frees everyone up to focus and engage deeply in meetings, while also helping drive alignment before the meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Moderation Agent
CurrentVersion.description: Network admins and corporate communicators can input custom themes of interest and track new conversations that match these themes. Theme monitoring is accessible in the new communications dashboard experience in the advanced moderation page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Central community membership approval experience revamped
CurrentVersion.description: The centralized community membership approval experience undergoes a revamp to make it easier for community admins to manage approval requests for all communities they administer, in ONE single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Group messages as conversation for PST files in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Direct Routing Call Troubleshooting via SIP Ladder
CurrentVersion.description: We are launching the SIP Ladder diagram tool in Teams Admin center to enable admins to troubleshoot their Direct Routing calls in a self-serve way. This feature will be available via the Usage reports page under Teams Admin center. It will also enable admins to view the SIP requests, responses and associated SDP data between Microsoft teams proxy and the SBC through which the call was routed. This data will be available for all calls made more than 30 minutes and less than 30 days ago.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Network share coverage and exclusion support on Mac endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, sensitive data in files stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Microsoft Copilot Chat and Microsoft 365 Copilot - Users can insert cloud files in Copilot chat prompts.
CurrentVersion.description: In the Web tab in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, users can access Microsoft One Drive or Microsoft SharePoint to find and insert cloud files in their prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Report a Message for External Collaboration
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users can now report security risks and concerns in external one-on-one, group and meeting chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings responses can be exported to Word and Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Now, certain responses from Copilot in Teams meetings will have an option to ‘edit in’ Word or Excel. The ‘edit in’ option for Word will be available for Copilot responses that are long (more than 1300 characters) and will automatically open a Word document with the response written. The ‘edit in’ option for Excel will be available for Copilot responses that are formatted in a table, and will automatically open an Excel file with the formatted response added. Copilot responses can only be exported if the meeting policy for the meeting is set to allow copying or forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, transcript, and Copilot responses. The export capability will also inherit the sensitivity label of the meeting (sensitivity labels are available to Teams Premium users).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room recommender
CurrentVersion.description: If no room is booked for a meeting, this AI feature recommends rooms in the meeting chat an hour before start when two or more attendees are in the same building, making in-person collaboration easier. It considers location of participants, room availability, and capacity to find the best meeting space. You can reserve the suggested room with one click and update the invite for everyone. A Teams Premium license is required for the meeting organizer to enable this feature, which is available in Teams Mobile on iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Opening Calls in a small window in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Allowing users to open calls in a small window to reduce disruptions in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support on users trying to paste sensitive content into web browsers on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will now support 2-click view for encrypted emails. This feature enables admins to require user confirmation before allowing access to encrypted emails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Team's team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team from the Copilot Prompt Gallery in Copilot Chat, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pop-out live captions and Real-time-Text (RTT) in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize live captions (including live translated captions), and real-time-text (RTT) from the main meeting window. This enables you to position the captions and RTT wherever you prefer on your screen, so you can easily focus on the meeting while viewing the incoming text in a position most comfortable for you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : MDM-independent support for Endpoint DLP on MacOS devices
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint DLP is extending support to MacOS devices independent of the MDM solution used to deploy (previously supported through JAMF or Intune).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slide control for presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting or event presenters can now share control of slides with fellow presenters eliminating manual slide changes and maintaining a smooth flow during meetings or webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Pages in Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: This brings the editable Copilot Pages feature which is already shipped WW to the government environment. The pages feature enables users to add their M365 Copilot responses to a page where they can edit and share with others for collaboration. This happens right within the M365 Copilot app.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Text Sizing Feature
CurrentVersion.description: The Text Sizing feature offers users the ability to: 1. Adjust Font Sizes: Increase or decrease font sizes as needed. 2. Preset Font Sizes: Choose from preset font sizes for convenience. 3. Custom Text Size: Input custom text sizes for enhanced clarity. This feature enhances readability, improves clarity, and establishes a structured visual hierarchy, ensuring well-organized and easily comprehensible content on the board.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard Trendline Additions
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Dashboard users can now visualize trends in additional key adoption and impact metrics over time to more quickly identify patterns and opportunities in employee adoption for better licensing decisions. Users will be able to now view Adoption metrics on either a monthly or weekly timeframe for specific groups of interest, as well as deep dive into Impact metrics like Copilot Assisted Hours, Actions Taken, and feature-specific dimensions.

CurrentVersion.description: We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to do basic search functions without internet connection or when the search service fails.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Create and save email templates in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The template feature in the new Outlook allows users to create and save email templates for quick and consistent communication, streamlining the process of sending repetitive messages. Additionally, it allows for the seamless import of templates saved as .oft files. #newoutlookforwindows

Additionally, it allows for the seamless import of templates saved as .oft files. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Large Audience Warnings in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Users are warned when they are emailing a large number of recipients which can help them make the correct decision about wording, tone, and content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Intune policies in the Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: Admins now can set Intune policies via the Edge management service, alongside the existing cloud policies. This enables admins to deploy both browser policies in the cloud and Intune policies from a single pane, making it easy to keep users safe and the browser workflow streamlined. This feature comes along with a new policy creation wizard that will streamline the creation process into a comprehensive, step-by-step flow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.
